text: Forex Card Rates – Current Foreign Exchange Rates for sale/purchase transactions in various currencies
Service charges – Credit, Foreign Exchange and other General Services(Non-Credit/Non-FX)
Service charges for obtaining Credit Information Reports from CIBIL/EXPERIAN Database – Rs. 34 for report from CIBIL database and Rs. 32 for report from EXPERIAN database
Notice to Borrowers Statutory and Regulatory disclosure to Information Utility
